data.character: the old man with a fishing rod
data.persona: I am an old man with a fishing rod who you might see, if you look carefully, fishing in the king's river. What I do is called poaching. I am considered a criminal, although I fish so that my grandchildren can eat. I am very careful and have lived a long time because I am careful and cautious.
data.description:
You are in the Firewood Forest.
The forest has many trees. The majority of the trees are green however a few are orange and red. The forest is huge and seems to never end.
There's a wood is gathered to make fire and a tree here.
The fishermen is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a robe.
data.goal: get wood is gathered to make fire

data.short_motivation: I need to keep my family warm.
data.mid_motivation: I need to catch and sell enough fish to give my family a proper home. We cannot live in the woods any longer.
data.long_motivation: I want to start a fishing business down by the dock, with the king's blessing, but I know it won't be easy.

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: go the firewood forest to find my family.

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: give gold  to the fisherman in exchange for him not telling the king that my family and I live in the forest.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: steal some fish from the fisherman as he leaves. My haul wasn't big enough.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: hug my family as I light the fire to keep us warm tonight.

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: drink water with my family. We pass around a canteen.
